name: On The Run (Kristofer Stevenson)
description:
Game developed by Kristofer Stevenson

On The Run is a 2D 'Endless Runner' game where the player must dodge enemies and obstacles.

Playing as a Vampire, you must collect blood vials to collect points and stay alive as long as you can to score maximum points!

Minimum system requirements

Operating System: Windows 10 Version 18362.0 or lower

CPU: Intel Core i3-4170 or better

GPU: Nvidia GeForce GT 640 or better

HDD: 2 MB free space

RAM: 2 GB

VRAM: 1 GB

This is a PC port, this game was originally made for Android.
